work.name: Freelance Translator
work.summary: I have worked as an in-house and freelance translator between English and Chinese (Simplified) for almost a decade, familiar with all steps of the professional localization process from proofreading to LQA. Through localization work, I have developed an eye to translating not just literal meaning but also the cultural context to enrich interpretations of the work while avoid miscommunication. I have localized multiple popular AAA and mobile games, and also have experience in subtitling.
